website_summaries.verdict: Designed as a work shoe, the Skechers Alley Cats has lived up to its design origins. The shoe has been one of the favourites of the people especially those who work with jobs involving strenuous activities. The shoe is basically made to survive under rough workplace surroundings and constant abusive use without sacrificing the comfort, though it might need some break-in time. With the good quality of the shoe that is offered in a really affordable price, this is clearly one of the best options for those who need what this footwear offers.
pros: Most reviewers claimed that the Skechers Alley Cats provide great comfort for the foot when being worn
A handful of reviewers praised the good quality of the shoe
Most buyers loved how the shoe fits perfectly on their foot
The Skechers Alley Cats is also offered in wide sizes
Some reviewers said that the shoe is perfect for work
A lot of the reviewers have been wearing the Skechers Alley Cats for years already and have stayed loyal to the shoe
A good number of reviewers loved how the shoe would last long with their regular use
Some reviewers were highly-appreciative of the shoe’s ability to stand up to abuse
The shoe is available in multiple colorways
The shoe can be purchased in a very affordable price
cons: Some wearers said that the shoe would need some break in time
A reviewer said that the shoe can be prone to peeling
A few users pointed out that the laces would eventually wear out
Some buyers said that the shoe can be a bit narrow for the foot
According to a few reviewers, the shoe is a bit heavy

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality shoe "leather"
customer_reviews.text: I bought these a few months ago, thinking the boot-like tread would be good for the winter. I wore the shoes a few times (<10) when it snowed and the traction was respectable. The shoe did fit well enough, despite being a bit on the heavy side. Unfortunately, with single-digit usage numbers, the oxfords starting falling apart. The "leather" cracked, rippped, and started peeling off the shoe. I have bought dozens of pairs of various Skechers shoes for myself and my family over the years, and had never experienced such poor quality. I hope this is an anomaly, but recent experience with most of my footwear purchases, seem to indicate a trend by the manufacturers towards creating short-term disposable shoes.
customer_reviews.author: simonsez

customer_reviews.title: Quality has dropped waay off.
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this same shoe design from sketchers for the last ten years. This is the first time that the "leather" has started peeling off the shoe like cheap plastic after I received them in August to replace my identical last pair that I wore out after 3 years. I have had pairs of these shoes in the past that have lasted 3-4 years and I usually wear out the sole of the heel before anything else. This is the first time I have ever encountered the leather peeling off the inside lining above the toe. The quality of this shoe fell way off.
customer_reviews.author: Brian S.

customer_reviews.title: Once reliable, now shoddy?
customer_reviews.text: I have owned several pairs of these shoes and in the past they have been durable and reliable. The most recent pair i purchased was very shoddily made. The soles on my shoes have cracked after only 4 months of wear. Likewise, the outer layer of leatherette has peeled off and cracked. I would
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Any of the shiny or suede looking shoes are of poor quality. The scuff resistant Alley or Tom Cats ...
customer_reviews.text: You have to be careful when buying Skechers Alley Cat shoes. Any of the shiny or suede looking shoes are of poor quality. The scuff resistant Alley or Tom Cats shoes are good quality (Black or Brown), but you have to make sure they are the Scuff resistant type. I have worn these shoes for years and have 5 pairs, some are great and some are lousy. Search Amazon for Skechers Tom Cats, the Skechers Mariners (Brown) are also a decent shoe.
customer_reviews.author: FEP

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy.
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived on time. It was a good fit. But after 3 weeks the right shoe formed a natural crease between the toes and the step. This further lead to the material cracking at the sides and bubbling of top smooth layer. This tells me that this shoe was not heat molded properly with the materials. I don’t use this for hard field work. But just for daily office use. I’m giving one stars because I expected better from a name brand and it’s lacking in quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: well made,it seems,but not very comfy at first.
customer_reviews.text: I had to put TWO sets of gel insoles in these shoes so I could wear them! Out of the box they fit good but boy did my feet hurt! they're made pretty well,it seems,and the tread seems tough and stiff...but that's why they hurt at first. I had to put TWO sets of gel insoles in them as there's no arch support or padding at all! they look good and they're finally getting broken in after more than a month so I'm using them. I put "Nikwax Leather Proof" on them and it works really great!! overall these shoes seem like they'll last but they're tough breaking in.
customer_reviews.author: Guitar Joe

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Ever Never Ever Buy these Shoes.  Ever
customer_reviews.text: My shoes are less than TWO MONTHS old and they've already developed blisters the size of dimes where the "leather" coating has separated from the backing. They look like snake shedding it's skin and this is just from daily wearing to work in an office. This is the second pair that feel apart within 6 months. Do not buy them as Sketchers has serious quality control and material problems. Worse yet, Amazon refuses to honor any warranty so I'm out $50 because they only covered for 30 days. 30 days? Amazon must know there's a problem if they don't warranty a supposedly pair of leather shoes for more than 30 days.
customer_reviews.author: MichaelK

customer_reviews.title: Still genuine leather uppers.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of Skechers Alley Cats, which I originally bought for style more for brand reputation. I just like this style of shoe, because I can pretty much wear it anywhere except maybe a formal event. The shoes I bought after my original pair were more expensive and a better quality, but when that brand started using cheaper materials, I went back to Skechers which still uses leather uppers and solid, durable soles at half the price of Doc Martens. The shoes fit well, are great for walking, and clean up easily. Like my previous Skechers, (which I still use for doing work around the house), I expect they’ll serve me well for the next few years.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Rondack

customer_reviews.title: Why do they say this is the same as the Skechers Men's Tom Cats Utility Shoe?
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying the Skechers Men's Tom Cats Utility Shoe for years and this is nothing like it. It has a cheap non-leather exterior that is shinny and it scuffs in a few weeks. These are not shoes for work. If you are in the hospitality industry or construction, these are not the shoes for you. Try to find the Skechers Men's Tom Cats Utility Shoe. I give these a -1 STAR as they are a cheap knockoff. I can't believe they put their name on these.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Kane

customer_reviews.title: Very uncomfortable toe box
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed, I wanted to like these, they seemed like a good quality. They hurt my big toe, despite buying the wide width, the design has more of a narrowing to a point to the outside of center which means plenty of room on the outside but on the inside it forces your toe against the narrowness of the toe box. I have a different style of the sketchers which have a typical toe box design and shoe shape. This design is just poor, I thought they needed breaking in but that wasn’t it, it just was poorly designed.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Van Damme

customer_reviews.title: Good for two years of moderate duty - probably
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of very similar shoes. The uppers are not really leather, but they are waterproof while they last - which my first pair did for nearly two years of nearly constant wear in all weathers. The comment recommending paste polish is good; do it monthly to extend useful life. The lug soles on the new pair are different from the old ones, (which are still good), so only time will tell about their durability. I am hoping for another two years of wear; if I get it, the $50 was well spent.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Lombard

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for work. Fit well and looked great - just like I've come to expect from Skechers. What I didn't expect was that with just over two months of wear, the "leather upper" would delaminate into tattered strips of 'pleather' with a suede/fabric layer underneath. I had no idea that Skechers had 'pleather' shoes - especially in their 'work' lineup.
customer_reviews.author: Geoff

customer_reviews.title: Wears out quickly
customer_reviews.text: The heels go quickly. The other problem with this brand or type within the brand, is the leather. It appears to be a veneer of leather atop another form of leather. The thin outer veneer looks fine but bubbles or rips off leaving the underlayer. This is a manufacturer problem, involving the choice of leather (grade). This should be remedied by using quality leather instead of fake. As for the heels wearing quickly, again, a bad choice of material.
customer_reviews.author: bristleconepines

customer_reviews.title: Tough No slip  ; winter work shoe
customer_reviews.text: These are a tough pair of shoes with nice thick soles . They are not water proof; but they are working well for my winter commute in Chicago. They are heavy, so its a bit tough to walk, but hey it should build some calf muscle right. They are a bit pricey at 60 but I was able to get them for 45 with the current discount. Oh yea order your exact fit, these shoes are spacious and on the loose side. I think they figured well use them for winter already.
customer_reviews.author: RiadH

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: I have had a number of these and similar from Skechers over the past 15+ years. They are durable and comfortable but they tend to be off on sizing in an unpredictable manner. I wear 9 but have always worn 8.5 in these but with this pair 9 was mostly correct. These actually have rubber soles that last vs another similar pair of Skechers that barely lasted 7 months because the hollow hard plastic sole cracked and collapsed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy Insoles immediately if your order these shoes. (Update)
customer_reviews.text: After the horrible break in time and the need for expensive insoles, These shoes started getting these large blister bubbles just after a few months. These blisters then crack and leave the black plastic/rubber coating frays and leaves, what looks like leather exposed. These were purchased in January and it is now late March. I work a desk job no extreme environment shifts, just sitting at a desk. I have attached pictures. Save your money and buy something else. These are the worst Sketchers in my life.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Good every day wear shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Everyday wear shoe. Tad bit extra room in the toes but not nearly as much as the Skechers "Relaxed fit" or the "Wide width". If you have a narrow foot, get the Medium width and you will still have wiggle room. This my second pair, I just wore the other pair out. These are a great substitute shoe if you wear boots all the time. Reccommend these shoes if you can find them as Skechers no longer makes them.
customer_reviews.author: Chappie1903

customer_reviews.title: Leather began cracking in the first couple months
customer_reviews.text: I alternate between black and brown shoes, and usually wear the brown pair 1-2 times per week to the office. Within two months of receiving these shoes, they started cracking across the top of the shoe where the front toe section flexes. Based on my 1-2 times per week, I probably wore the shoes less than 20 times before I noticed them beginning to crack. Guess I will be looking for another pair of brown shoes very soon, just not made by Skechers.
customer_reviews.author: Mike W

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes for motorcycle riding
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of the Sketcher Alley Cat Utility shoe. My first pair lasted 12 years and still have some decent tread on them. I wear them mostly when riding my Harley. They are way less expensive than motorcycle boots or shoes. They grip really well so there is no worry of my feet slipping out from under me when holding up the bike. They offer great support and are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Can confirm reports about the leather peeling.
customer_reviews.text: Like many here I am also a long time buyer of this specific show, and have been purchasing this exact style of shoe for about 6 years now. I generally replace them once every 8-12 months or so, but the last two pairs have just inexplicably started peeling and cracking. I wear them daily, but in an office environment. There's no reason they should get that damaged in that environment. I bought the pair in this picture 7 months ago and this is already happening. It's sad, because I love the style of these shoes. I guess it's time to find a new brand.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon T.

customer_reviews.title: Best casual shoes ever made
customer_reviews.text: I love Skechers shoes and I have always owned a pair of Alley Cat oxfords. They are very comfortable to wear in almost any activity and are well constructed. The treads on the soles are very slip resistant and the arch support is solid, even for a flat footed person like me. They're very style neutral and I have worn them with jeans as well as suits. Once this current pair is too destroyed to wear comfortably I'm going to purchase another. Or two.
customer_reviews.author: joker5974

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy but surface facade
customer_reviews.text: Well made sturdy shoe but you cannot scuff these shoes otherwise the leather facade just peels away after a few wears. Shockingly disappointed...see photos
customer_reviews.author: Saint Martin

customer_reviews.title: The leather looks like vinyl or plastic where it's cracked
customer_reviews.text: After about 3 months the top layer of leather has separated from the rest of the shoe at the sole and the wear lines / creases that developed on the upper part of the shoe, have cracked and are peeling. The leather looks like vinyl or plastic where it's cracked. VERY disappointed in this shoe. Not able to return. I also had to buy cushioned insoles because there is NO padding in this shoe, and wearing them killed my feet. Not much in the way of arch support either. I've heard that Sketchers are incredible, comfortable, long wearing shoes. You can't prove it with these shoes. I will never buy another pair from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Beck

customer_reviews.title: Shoe's looked good out the box,turned out to be crap! Shame on sketchers name!
customer_reviews.text: Shoe's looked good out the box,very comfortable- But they didn't last 2 months before the leather started to peel, bubble. First it started on the Left shoe then the RT side. Poor quality .. I'm a technician at a top end dealership.my normal work shoes last at least a year minimum before wear and crease's. My old Snap ON Are going on 4 year's just the soles worn. Not happy 😣
customer_reviews.author: simon laming

customer_reviews.title: A rare miss from Sketchers, try another pair first.
customer_reviews.text: Not even a little slip resistant, dangerously so in fact, but comfortable. The leather upper cracked, peeled, and began to look generally terrible within 5 months of moderate indoor only wear, making them innapropriate for any sort of uniform or outfit one might need to look clean and well kept in. The rest of the shoe did hold up well I'll admit, making the leather the real issue if you don't need slip protection, even using leather protecting products.
customer_reviews.author: Richy K

customer_reviews.title: Herman Muster shoes
customer_reviews.text: I remember when Sketchers took pride in their product and bragged about the comfort. I was very disappointed at the lack of padding and stiffness of the shoe. Feels like I'm wearing Herman Munsters' shoes. I cannot say that I would recommend this to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: rfrancoi

customer_reviews.title: In 4 month, shoe is coming apart
customer_reviews.text: The "leather" uppers are a thin layer of "leather" glued onto whatever the shoe is made from. It is peeling off after just a few months of wear. The shoe is glued together and is coming apart also within just a few months of wear. Work in an office so this is not due to hard wear! Not happy with this shoe and don't plan to purchase any more Sketcher products.
customer_reviews.author: C J

customer_reviews.title: Looked great, didn't hold up
customer_reviews.text: I had this same shoe that I bought in 2011, and wore it quite a bit over the last 4 years. It was time for me to replace them, and I looked and looked and just decided to buy the same shoe. It wore well, was comfortable, and has a classic look. Revised: after 4 months of moderate wear in an office environment, the leather has peeled away on both shoes and my feet get wet when it rains or snows. Moisture seeps in from he peeled leather and apparently from the sole and seems. Awful craftsmanship.
customer_reviews.author: Conspiracy

customer_reviews.title: Not like they used to be
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased at least 5 pairs of these prior to this. These look the same, but they are not. The leather is extremely stiff and cheap looking. The quality in construction is lacking. The leather is puckering and seams inside the shoe were not trimmed, so they rub against my foot. I had a good run, but it's over for me.
customer_reviews.author: TJtheMan

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart within 7 weeks
customer_reviews.text: I purchased Skechers Alley Cat and Tom Cat shoes in the past, but never had a pair fall apart as these did. After a week there was a crease across the top where foot bends. No problem. The tissue thin plastic cover began to peel. And peel. And peel some more. Would not recommend these at all. Check out my photos.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as they used to be  :o(
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing Alley Cats for several years now but the last couple of pair I've gotten seem to have been pretty poor quality. Not sure what has happened differently in the past few years but they're definitely not what they're used to be. I've experienced the same issues as some of the other posters... peeling and cracked "leather" and cracked soles. It's a shame because I really loved these shoes. May have to find an Alley Cat replacement.
customer_reviews.author: TSmithLXIX

customer_reviews.title: Very good, nice looking shoe at a fair price.
customer_reviews.text: I have had severel Paris of these shoes over the last 29 years or so. They are great shoes. I would have given 5-stars instead of 4, however, the last two pairs that I have owned seemed to wear out quicker than before. Also, I have seen some reviews complaint about these does falling apart. I haven't had problems like these until the shoes are several years old. One other thing to note is that these shoes are not a replacement for work boots. They just aren't.
customer_reviews.author: Popfizz7

customer_reviews.title: Great but heavy working shoes
customer_reviews.text: Excellent pair of working shoes. They arrive delayed but as described. The only reason why I don’t give a 5 stars is their weight. They are heavier than other similar shoes but other than that, they are awesome to wear on a daily basis
customer_reviews.author: Julio C. Rios

customer_reviews.title: Not durable at all.
customer_reviews.text: Well I’ve had some Sketcher’s I’ve really liked but my last couple have really been let downs. Bought this pair in December, 4 months later on is cracking, and other is not far behind. The cracking is through the colored coat on the leather at a point where it bends. The only good part is the failure shows how cheap the leather is. It’s worth noting I wear them for work in an office so pretty light use too.Think I am done with Sketchers.
customer_reviews.author: David J. Trevino

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable & Professional
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband to wear with his security uniform for work. We have bought these before. They are comfortable right from the box and wear beautifully. They look very professional with any type of uniform and are comfortable with a large amount of walking. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: pang

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I normally love Skechers shoes but these are by far the worst i have ever put on my feet. They are uncomfortable and just bad. They feel cheap and I could barely walk a few steps when I tired them on. Not worth it. I promptly returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Phatguy

customer_reviews.title: Degraded quality!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've been purchasing Skechers work shoes for several years. However,my last 2 pairs have degraded in quality by far. Last pair only lasted 2-3 weeks and the so called leather is cracking and peeling. I'll never buy these shoes again.
customer_reviews.author: Coppertop

customer_reviews.title: Upper not all leather. Covered by plastic coating that comes off in pieces! Under unfinished.
customer_reviews.text: This replaced great pair that lasted many years til heavy sole wore through! This pair has unfinished leather upper covered by shiny thin plastic film! Plastic film started peeling off after about 4 months. Impossible to shine rough unfinished leather underneath. Shoes now a disgrace to wear in public. Old ones always took a great shine. Called supplier. Referred to manufacturer. Emailed in Nov. asking what to do. No response. Emailed again Dec. Still no response! Now Jan. 19,2019.
customer_reviews.author: Old Granddad

customer_reviews.title: Exterior material cracked and bubbled quickly.
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are fine, but I only wear them to work once or twice a week, and after two months the surface of the shoe is already bubbling and cracking on top of the toe of the shoe where the bend occurs. I would look elsewhere if you are looking for a shoe that will look nice for a long period of time. Overall, they're pretty comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Good work shoes
customer_reviews.text: I got these for work. I stand and walk all day in a retail environment. They hurt my feet the first few days but that's usually normal no matter what shoe I buy. Their holding up with no signs of cracking or anything. I think they'll last longer than the cheaper shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Ted Shockey

customer_reviews.title: Sketchers size 8s tend to run a bit large.
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd pair of Sketchers I've purchased. The other pair were boots and I've been very pleased. This pair of Alley Cats, like the boots, run a bit large so it's been difficult to get the right sock combination to get the fit right. They've also been tough to break in, but they're working decently. I cut off the little loop on the back because it kept catching my pants. I'm okay with these but will definitely prefer to purchase them in-store versus online going forward in order to get the right fit from the beginning. It will be worth the extra cost.
customer_reviews.author: C. Guzman

customer_reviews.title: OK work shoe, won't win any comfort awards
customer_reviews.text: I wear these for work. I'm on my feet all day, and I need something which will give me a degree of traction since I'm in and out of a walk in freezer all day and it gets slick sometimes. They also are thick enough that my feet don't often get cold unless I'm in there for an extended period of time. Wish I could say they were comfortable, but that would be an exaggeration. After the break in period, they suffice.
customer_reviews.author: D. Harris

customer_reviews.title: Poor black plastic coating on shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Shoe has a high shine plastic coating that bubbles and peals away from the leather beneath. The debonding occurs anywhere there is a scuff or crack from bending the toe. I do not suggest this product for anyone wanting a sho to last longer than 3 months or never get the shoe wet. I wish I could show you a picture of how tore up the coating is only after 3 months. If this failure was fixed then I would buy this shoe again. Comfortable and durable sole. Brian
customer_reviews.author: Brian McCoy

customer_reviews.title: Good Work Shoe
customer_reviews.text: My husband goes through work shoes quickly. These shoes seem to last him six months. The fit is great as it is hard to find extra wide shoes. They are comfortable and well worth the money
customer_reviews.author: L. Doctor

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THESE SHOES, it is NOT REAL LEATHER!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I consider this shoes a FRAUD. They offer LEATHER upper and and after few weeks of normal use the upper comes apart in small pieces of something that is like a FILM glued onto some tissue. Unfortunately I had already ordered a second pair when I noticed this problem SKETCHERS is not telling the truth when they advertise "LEATHER UPPER" and theese shoes do not provide what the customers expect for the price. AMAZON staff people PLEASE follow up this formal complaint and think they should be OUT of the AMAZON list of good quality products. Dr. A.D. Camacho
customer_reviews.author: A. D. Camacho

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoes. I am not use to wearing regular shoes to work. I've worn higher top shoes or boots, if you will. I did add an insole for even more comfort only because I am on my feet for 8 to 10 hours a day.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: The picture was taken after my son wore this for one day. Avoid this seller at all cost "Last Pair USA". They are not returning emails and looks like their ratings have taken a dip lately.
customer_reviews.author: zaeemrk47

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality outside leather
customer_reviews.text: I’m an RN and I have worn these for about 5 months. They are comfortable and supportive. The outside however has not worn well. The fake leather uppers and toe area scuff easily and have little tears in them. I am on my feet a lot but it’s not like I’m climbing ladders or walking outside in them. I’m very disappointed in they way they look worn out after such a short period of time. I’ve worn Sketchers products for years and have been pleased up until now. Thumbs down on this pair of shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Weckerle

customer_reviews.title: These went downhill
customer_reviews.text: Suddenly run very small . Cannot get ionto foot . Third buy prior two times ok . Also they are NOT leather uppers. Lie. Like contact paper glued to grey cardboard. Heel area in back folds in — too weak . Initially too stiff then collapses Cannot put on without shoehorn . Junk shoes Like the style etc. Skechers, why not make them correctly ? More$ ok , for real leather made right
customer_reviews.author: J. K. Grady

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product. Within 3 weeks of wearing these
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product. Within 3 weeks of wearing these, the leather began to crack and bubble. I work in an office setting and don't put on a lot of wear to these shoes typically. The plastic wrapped leather has peeled, bubbled, and cracked on all parts of the shoes after about 2 months of use. These will be used as lawn mowing shoes from now on. This is the second different model of Skechers shoes that I have bought, and have been completely let down as a result. Hopefully they hire a better quality control department soon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They feel very sturdy. The reason I said that the fit was ...
customer_reviews.text: They feel very sturdy. The reason I said that the fit was somewhat large is that I have narrow feet and they tend to slide around inside the shoe. I've walked about 20 miles in them so far and they still feel good. Would recommend using some cushioned insoles, though.
customer_reviews.author: N. Langle

customer_reviews.title: Besides just being a great sturdy shoe
customer_reviews.text: I buy a new pair about once a year, and have been doing so since the year 2000. Besides just being a great sturdy shoe, I'm probably the only person who has been saved from a rattlesnake bite by these shoes. His 4 fangs scraped the leather but couldn't get through the toe. Being way out in the wilderness, I literally owe my life or at least my leg to these shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Nick S. Sharrer

customer_reviews.title: Product feels like it's cheap material
customer_reviews.text: Product feels like it's cheap material, but you get what you pay for. I can feel that they will not last long. They look good, are comfortable on the first wear. Rubber is definitely not made of a sturdy material and I can tell they will wear quickly. The body of the shoe has a nice suede feel to it so they don't just look like a work shoe, but not tough enough to weather a heavy storm of working.
customer_reviews.author: david  tomassi

customer_reviews.title: a bad lot, or bad shoe?
customer_reviews.text: I've owned many Skechers shoes like these in the past and have loved them. This pair however hasn't held up. I'd only had them for 2 months and the top of the shoe, above the toes, where the bend happens with normal walking, has peeled apart. They are still super comfortable and I won't hesitate in buying them again in the future, but I certainly hope the future purchases will hold up longer than 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Bogaard

customer_reviews.title: Exercize lol
customer_reviews.text: I use to wear size 14 in Skechers because my foot was too fat. Now since I've have lost a lot of weight. I have had to down size and 13 m in this shoes size fits perfectly. I'm very happy with this shoe. I am at nice body weight and I really like this shoe and how the difference fits well for me.
customer_reviews.author: Leonardo P. Ambrose

customer_reviews.title: Stomper
customer_reviews.text: Big tough shoe. A little tight in the toe because it needs to be broken in a little. Handles the elements well.
customer_reviews.author: JPM

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply Made -- Don't Waste Your Money
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this shoe, and styles similar to it, for well over 10 years from Sketcher. They used to be great quality. Now, after just a month, or so, the "leather" starts peeling away. If you are going to wear these shoes daily, they will look awful in about a month. Be warned.
customer_reviews.author: R. Lahrman

customer_reviews.title: Good for looks, great for avoiding a fall
customer_reviews.text: These look great. I can wear them in a business casual office environment without shame. They are comfortable, durable, and the anti slip soles have kept me from falling on wet, slippery pavement.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Chance

customer_reviews.title: Has its pros and cons.
customer_reviews.text: Style is great and look is good. The tongue is rough and was scraping my foot on top near shoelace. Also quite heavy and will tire you if you walk alot.
customer_reviews.author: Cesar Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Initially, these shoes seemed decent and I had a ...
customer_reviews.text: Initially, these shoes seemed decent and I had a similar pair of Sketchers for years that I likes... over the last 2-3 months, these shoes began showing cracks in the leather at the flex points...obviously a tanning defect. I won't be buying these again.
customer_reviews.author: Zenfitness

customer_reviews.title: If you buy them you will be sadly disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I have always purchased these same shoes and now I will never purchase another pair. The top of the shoe is peeling and the plastic is coming off only after two months of use. BUYER BEWARE THESE ARE DEFECTIVE SHOES! If you buy them you will be sadly disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: They also hit my arch funny and begin to hurt after a few hours
customer_reviews.text: the most uncomfortable shoes I have ever owned. These seem to run very large. They also hit my arch funny and begin to hurt after a few hours. The soles are also very hard and unforgiving. They offer no cushioning if you walk a lot or stand all day. I thought Sketchers were all about comfort but i guess not. These are terrible. Do not purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Love my Sketchers
customer_reviews.text: This runs a little small compared to other style Sketchers. Over all great shoes. Sketchers are now my go to shoe for all my needs.
customer_reviews.author: JTB 19702

customer_reviews.title: Great for big and tall
customer_reviews.text: I'm 6'8" and 280 pounds. Depending on the shoe I need a 15 or 16 medium. Skecher's doesn't make these shoes in a 16 so I took a chance on the 15. The 15 is true to size and works great for men. I really like the thick and heavy soles as I tend to quickly wear out all those lightweight soled shoes being offered at twice the price by other companies. The soles provided good traction in the snow and they weren't too bad in the ice, either. I liked these shoes enough to order a second pair in black. Downsides? The brown finish is easy to scratch. I suspect they will be warm in the summer months.
customer_reviews.author: S. Barland

customer_reviews.title: Not happy, hope you have better luck!
customer_reviews.text: I have owned 3 of this brand of Sketchers in the past. They were awesome! I can't say the same for this pair. It was late getting here, feels wider than normal and has a blemish on top of the left shoe that sticks out like a sore thumb, and doesn't feel as comfortable as the previous ones did. Sending shoes back is a hassle. Why were these ever sent to me like this in the first place????
customer_reviews.author: Dwight

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with the fit and comfort however this pair has ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of Skechers of this style. Very happy with the fit and comfort however this pair has been giving me difficulty with the leather upper. Material seems to be peeling off and cracking in spots. These have been purchased in August and it is now November trying to contact seller but not sure how
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: I used to purchase this item at JCPenney until they stopped carrying it probably due to past poor quality or complaints
customer_reviews.text: Product quality has greatly improved. I used to purchase this item at JCPenney until they stopped carrying it probably due to past poor quality or complaints. I am extremely glad that Amazon has picked up the ball and started to carry this shoe. In regards to the shoe cracking on top is true however this can be avoided by applying some Black Kiwi Shoe Polish Paste. No liquid and definitely no parade gloss. This greatly helps in the prevention of the shoe leather cracking.
customer_reviews.author: DAB

customer_reviews.title: save your money. look nice, feel horrible
customer_reviews.text: listed as a wide fit. not wide at all. no arch support either. i would like to return them but i wore them hoping they would loosen or break in a little and my feet are hurting now even after not wearing them for a day.
customer_reviews.author: M. McManus

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: The only shoes my husband will wear!! Was glad to find them in a dark brown....was sick of the seeing him in the same black ones all the time. And, the brown really does look nicer. He is on his feet all day and with his work, his shoes really take a beating. He swears by these. He goes through shoes alot and we've tried other brands and they just dont last as long.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: This new pair seem to fit better, a bit narrower than the previous pair
customer_reviews.text: I had a pair before where the soles got cracked and soaked in water. I bought the same size and I'm still working on breaking them in. This new pair seem to fit better, a bit narrower than the previous pair. Good work shoes and great in the snow.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes. I have a pair for 6 months ...
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes. I have a pair for 6 months with about 2 months life left. I have been wearing this type of shoe for 30 plus years now. These Skechers are what the Old original Die Hards were. If I can get 8 hard months out of a pair of shoes that are worn 40 hours a week wet or dry, than I got my money worth out of them. I just purchased two pairs I fear of not being able to get them when I need them. I will never go back to die quick again.
customer_reviews.author: Hebiewantsabeer

customer_reviews.title: Sharp looking, comfy, solid shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with these. I have wide feet, freakishly wide it seems. I did have to buy a 1/2 size larger than I would have if there was a wide option for these shoes. That aside, they look very nice. These seem like pretty solid shoes, they fit well, and are nearly as comfy as my broken in tennis and running shoes. It's a very good compromise between absolute comfort and office appropriate style. I'm quite happy with these shoes, and for the price, I think they're a wonderful deal.
customer_reviews.author: Brian S

customer_reviews.title: Proper Casual Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are not something I recommend buying online but Skechers are sized properly. I keep buying the same shoe (basically) until they wear out. They last for years. I must have had eight pairs in the last 15 years. HOWEVER, this is my first set of "Scuff Resistant." I can't attest to the quality of that but the flat, or matte, look to these, in black & brown, appeal to me. The seller took two weeks to get them out but it was over the Christmas/New Years holidays so I will keep the 5 star rating for them on the assumption they gave their employees those weeks off.
customer_reviews.author: OK

customer_reviews.title: Beware!  These shoes crack on top after a few months!!!!
customer_reviews.text: After only 3 months of non heavy-duty use, they have cracks on the top. Very disappointed in this, something you shouldn't see this early on. Will look for another brand next time I purchase something similar.
customer_reviews.author: Squeaky

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking but a bit uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I like how the shoes fit as far as the toe area, but the tongue of the shoe is stiff and kind of digs into the front part of my ankle instead of resting ontop of it. The inner sole of the shoe is kind of stiff also, might want to add some cushion to it. The rubber on bottom is nice and thick
customer_reviews.author: Tote

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I wore them at my wedding and have worn that pair into the ground over the last four years. They lasted an extremely long time for how much abuse they took being my primary shoes for work and home. The combination of comfort and style is unmatched by any other shoe I have worn.
customer_reviews.author: Geoffrey Millette

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: This is a good shoe. I generally buy this exact shoe brand at Sears but this time I ordered it from Amazon, and got it next day. Good looking (always get compliments on that) and goes well with jeans or khakis. Fairly durable. Although you shouldn't expect that these will last more than a year. I'm hard on my shoes - wear them every day - and so they last me 6-12 months on average. I keep buying them when they wear out.... I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are a bit large. However, because ...
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are a bit large. However, because of the way these fit, I'm sure he next size down would be too small. Wearing them for work in the HVAC industry in Arizona, they hurt the outer sides of my feet. I've been wearing them for work, for three days now. I would return them if I may. Going to check with amazon about that in a moment.
customer_reviews.author: AZ Man

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I got these shoes as I needed some dress type looking shoes, but I wanted something sturdy enough to change a tire with if needed. So far they have worked out well. They look nice, but are sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Mojave702

customer_reviews.title: No cushion, no support, not for heavier people.
customer_reviews.text: No built in insole or cushion. Extremely hard on the feet and not suitable for walking long distances. Causes blisters and cuts. Not recommended for people of a larger figure. Crocs are more comfortable and I hate crocs.
customer_reviews.author: Isaac Q.

customer_reviews.title: Leather ?
customer_reviews.text: I don't believe it's made with any leather. I cut mine up after a scuff developed into a denuding of the toe area. It said leather upper. Not sure what a upper is but my autopsy indicated all manmade like material. I liked the shoe but it had a coating that did not take wax polish. Lasted 4 months of daily office use.
customer_reviews.author: Allen Whitehead

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe
customer_reviews.text: I always get compliments on these shoes. They are very versatile and can be worn with just about anything.
customer_reviews.author: Alfredo Garcia Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality- used to be better
customer_reviews.text: My husband has worn these shoes in dark brown for many years (10+) and he used to love them, but the last pair we purchased lasted a mere 4 months before the toe started peeling! The last few pairs have peeled earlier and earlier.They use to last years... but that was years ago. Unfortunately it seems like Sketcher's quality has gone down hill very quickly. I will not buy these shoes again.
customer_reviews.author: Devi

customer_reviews.title: That the shoe fit as expected
customer_reviews.text: The shoe had good arch support fits as expected and very comfortable and safe to use for work
customer_reviews.author: Giovanni

customer_reviews.title: Leather Upper is failing fast...
customer_reviews.text: The shoes fit fine but after only a few months, the leather upper material is already starting to crack where the toe bend is. Skechers are usually pretty good shoes that last me a long time. Sad to say that these fail to make the grade.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Love the way the shoes fit but this shoes do not last.. this is my 3rd pair. Each one started to crack after 2 to 3 months of wearing Them to work...
customer_reviews.author: apostle

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and Rugged
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the brushed suade in brown. The size was the right fit and the price is more than reasonable. There is a slight tightness, however, this is probably due to the sturdy (high quality) materials needing broken in. The shoe appearance is business casual and at the same time the sole height is similar to a boot. The oxford style doesn't appeal to me so the alley cat is my favorite shoe for work. Retro in terms you'll get visible scratch marks on these, but that is expected and the point of this particular color.
customer_reviews.author: GS-Tennessee

customer_reviews.title: Both pairs fit as expected and are comfortable, though I use my own inserts for support
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of these shoes and I have had them for over 6 months. Both pairs fit as expected and are comfortable, though I use my own inserts for support. I purchased the "non-shiny" type. The shiny type have some a laminated surface and this is what people are complaining about regarding the cracking. The non-shiny don't have any laminated surface and are holding up just fine.
customer_reviews.author: MT

customer_reviews.title: Good Solid Shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are very good solid shoes. I've won these type issues for several years and have really no complaints. It's one of those items that when you go out and shop for a replacement, you always look for the same type. Since I started wearing them, they have become fashionable. Initially everyone thought that they were a bit clunky and reminiscent of work shoes. Quality one out. Now the shoes and its type are very fashionable and almost every major manufacturer has a style of this type. Good stuff. In summary, it is a very good shoe, very durable, and I think good looking.
customer_reviews.author: Shadow

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: A little wider than expected but sturdy and built well. Comfortable for the most part but a little wider than the Mariner by Skechers.
customer_reviews.author: Charles B. Slay

customer_reviews.title: Used to be good... now they're cheap
customer_reviews.text: Used to be a good brand/style. Now, my most recent purchase of these is clearly a big drop in quality. One bump of the plastic toe guard and these are permanently dented. Cannot be pushed back out from the inside. The leather bubbles and peels off after a few months too. They look good out of the box but they don't hold up anymore, even if only worn for an office job.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: One shoe perfect, the other peeling within a month
customer_reviews.text: No doubt they sourced these from a different factory or used cheaper materials, but these aren't the same as the ones they sold a few years ago. I agree with some other posters in that regard. The leather is fake and peeling already on one shoe, I should return it but I'll just stop buying sketchers.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin C. Farrell

customer_reviews.title: A great shoe for every day work
customer_reviews.text: This is actually my second pair of these shoes, the first pair lasted about 18 months which is pretty good compared to most of my work shoes in the past due to I get more wear out of these then regular shoes. The thick sole is great in rain and snow and feet get less cold in winter. I recommend the shoes if you're on the fence and for the price they are well worth it
customer_reviews.author: Mark Kugler

customer_reviews.title: They looked good when I received them
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I like about the shoes is that they are sturdy. However the pair I received are pretty bad. The exterior leather surface is bubbling and peeling off at the toe end and pretty much everywhere that the material creased. Unfortunately it's just the left shoe. If I wasn't wearing them for work I would have definitely thrown them away by now.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Scott

customer_reviews.title: Cracking and Peeling within first hour of wearing!
customer_reviews.text: Great looking shoes, husband loves these and finds them very comfortable .. Run true to size - gets a pair or two every year! 12/27/21 Well they still are a good looking shoe BUT my husband wore them for the first time this morning and the top of both shoes started peeling and cracking -within first hour of wearing!! Be warned something is up with the "leather" ..I read some other reviews seems we are not the only one who has had this problem!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Skechers Alley Cat oxfords
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with my purchase. They fit and feel comfortable. And they look awesome. Exactly what I wanted. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: chefmattman

customer_reviews.title: it was 30 bucks cheaper and looks like suede.
customer_reviews.text: My 2nd or 3rd pair, I actually use them as my office shoes. I got the unfinished leather this time, it was 30 bucks cheaper and looks like suede.
customer_reviews.author: nougat420

customer_reviews.title: Fit as expected
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been wearing this style of shoes since 2003. I stopped wearing them after I was unable to find them at stores. I would go to sketcher brick and motors and could never find them. Shoes fit perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Tony G.

customer_reviews.title: 4th pair of Alley Cat Skechers. I always spray ...
customer_reviews.text: 4th pair of Alley Cat Skechers. I always spray on the heavy side with water repellant prior to my first use, left to dry for a couple days they are ready to go. Work outdoors in FL so get moist to wet frequently. Last a little more than a year as work shoes before they become yard work shoes in which they last another year. Only hope they continue to make.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Well-constructed, Durable
customer_reviews.text: Skechers have always been my go-to shoe for casual style, reasonable price and overall comfort. They will last years with minimal care.
customer_reviews.author: MACO

product_meta.title: Skechers Mens Alley Cats 7111
product_meta.description: Go on the prowl in the classic SKECHERS Alley Cats shoe. Smooth leather upper in a lace up casual oxford with stitching and overlay accents. Plain round toe.
feature_bullets: Lace-up shoe featuring leather upper with lightly padded collar and pull-on loop at counter
